pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'eXtra' / 'eXperimental' Functionality for Robust Statistics // Robustness -- 'eXperimental', 'eXtraneous', or 'eXtraordinary' Functionality for Robust Statistics. Hence methods which are not well established, often related to methods in package 'robustbase'. Amazingly, 'BACON()', originally by Billor, Hadi, and Velleman (2000) doi:10.1016/S0167-9473(99)00101-2 has become established in places. The "barrow wheel" `rbwheel()` is from Stahel and Mchler (2009) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2009.00706.x.
